author: Dion W.

review: This is incredible technology. Very easy to setup and use, throws crystal-clear HD movies from Netflix and other streaming vendors up on the screen using virtually no power from your computer or phone. Can also cast anything you are viewing in a browser onto your TV (but without an app you will drain battery). Amazon is the spoiler in all this, not providing an app for Chromecast because they have a competing product -- at a much more expensive price. This is fun, cheap, and excellent.
author: Lois Brandt
